name: Airlie Beach Glass Bottom Boat Day Tours
description: Experience the Whitsundays like never before on our 70-minute glass bottom boat tour. Perfect for families, friends, and solo travelers, this tour offers a unique window to the vibrant underwater world of the Great Barrier Reef without getting wet. Marvel at the breathtaking views of coral reefs, colorful fish, and diverse marine life. Our shaded vessel, 'Bottoms Up', ensures a comfortable journey as you cruise through the idyllic islands of The Whitsundays. Don't miss the bonus photo opportunity at Lions Lookout, offering stunning views over the harbor and Whitsunday Islands.
includes:
70 Minute Guided Glass Bottom Boat Discovery Tour
Funny and Informative Commentary About The Reef
Courtesy Bus
Fully Shaded Vessel
All Safety Equipment
Life Jackets For Minors
Bonus photo stop at Lions Lookout
highlights:
See local coral reefs and marine life
Experience the Whitsundays on a 70-minute tour
Explore the gateway to the Great Barrier Reef
Get up close with vibrant corals and marine life
Enjoy a shaded vessel custom-made for coral reef viewing
Bonus photo stop at Lions Lookout
price_tiers: Adult (Ages 14+): A$89 | Child (Ages 3-13): A$79 | Family (2 Adults, 2 Children): A$269 | Private Charter (1-37 Guests): A$2999 | Senior (Valid Seniors card required): A$79 | Infant (Ages 0-2): Free
ideal_for: Families, friends, solo travelers, and marine life enthusiasts seeking a unique and educational experience in the Whitsundays.
